data.title: Desperate Characters
data.meta_description: Softcover. Uncorrected proof of first Norton edition. Introduction by Jonathan Franzen. Slight rubbing, else fine in glossy wrappers. Uncommon novel, basis for the 1971 film directed by Frank Gilroy, and featuring Shirley MacLaine. Item #578151 ISBN: 039331894X
data.text:
Softcover. Uncorrected proof of first Norton edition. Introduction by Jonathan Franzen. Slight rubbing, else fine in glossy wrappers. Uncommon novel, basis for the 1971 film directed by Frank Gilroy, and featuring Shirley MacLaine.

Item #578151

ISBN: 039331894X
